name: Clinic by the Bay
description: At Clinic by the Bay, our mission is to understand and serve, with dignity and respect, the health wellness needs of the medically underserved in the San Francisco Bay Area. Clinic by the Bay is the safety net for those who have no affordable option for high-quality, compassionate primary, acute, chronic or preventative medical.
